                    double[] unscaledMax,

        Scales a IDataSet using the the maximum and minimum scaled and unscaled values specified

        Parameters:
        dataset - IDataSet to normalize
        scaledMax - Array of maximum scaled values
        scaledMin - Array of minimum scaled values
        unscaledMax - Array of maximum unscaled values
        unscaledMin - Array of minimum unscaled values

      • scale

                  double unscaledMax,
                  double unscaledMin,
                  double scaledMax,
                  double scaledMin)

        Scale an array of values from a specific domain [unscaledMin, unscaledMax] to other domain [scaledMin, scaledMax]

        Parameters:
        values - Double array of values to be scaled
        unscaledMax - Double maximum unscaled domain
        unscaledMin - Double minimum unscaled domain
        scaledMax - Double maximum scaled domain
        scaledMin - Double minimum scaled domain

      • scale

        public double scale(double value,
                    double unscaledMax,
                    double unscaledMin,
                    double scaledMax,
                    double scaledMin)

        Scale a value from a specific domain [unscaledMin, unscaledMax] to other domain [scaledMin, scaledMax]

        Parameters:
        value - Double value to be scaled
        unscaledMax - Double maximum unscaled domain
        unscaledMin - Double minimum unscaled domain
        scaledMax - Double maximum scaled domain
        scaledMin - Double minimum scaled domain
        Returns:
        double Value scaled
